summary:
Objectives :
* Stretch the limits of Science and of my own knowledge. 
* Use Chemistry for innovation at the interface with biology and/or material sciences.
* Expand my expertise to other disciplines and techniques.

Specialisations : Organic synthesis, Carbohydrates, Iminosugars, Click Chemistry, Multivalent Systems, radiochemistry (F-18), radiotracers, polymers, materials, crosslinkers.

awards: [{'title': 'MITACS Accelerate Fellowship', 'description': 'I was awarded a MITACS Accelerate postdoctoral fellowship to conduct research on universal crosslinkers, along with my co-workers C. Simhadri and L. Bi. MITACS is a Canadian not-for-profit organization that has been supporting industrial and social innovation in Canada designing and delivering research and training programs in Canada for over 20  years.  This  fellowship  encourages  partnerships  with  the  industry,  allowing  me  to  work  part-time  in  applied research for Epic Ventures, Inc. who provided more than half of the funding.', 'issuer': 'MITACS Accelerate', 'date': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': 'ICS Travel Award', 'description': None, 'issuer': 'Canadian Institute for Health Research (CIHR)', 'date': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': "Bourse doctorale du Minist√®re de l'Enseignement Sup√©rieur et de la Recherche (MESR)", 'description': 'As I was completing both my Dipl√¥me d‚ÄôIng√©nieur and my MSc in Molecular & Supramolecular Chemistry with an research internship overseas, I was granted a 3-year studentship from the Ministry of Higher Education and Research (MESR in French), allowing me to pursue a PhD on the topic and in the laboratory of my choice at the Universit√© de Strasbourg. The attribution of this highly competitive studentships was based on grades obtained during the MSc and an interview by a 10-strong pool of professors.', 'issuer': "Universit√© de Strasbourg / Minist√®re de l'Enseignement Sup√©rieur et de la Recherche", 'date': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}]

volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'role': 'Volunteer', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'PECOHUE - Programa de Emprendimientos en Compost y Huerta', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'SOCIAL_SERVICES', 'description': 'PECOHUE is a program in Buenos Aires (Argentina) that helps socially and mentally disabled youth (16-21 years old) to develop their relation to work and integrate society. One of the two sites is a small organic farm that produces and sells vegetables and compost on local markets. The youth are involved in the daily tasks of farming, and as well in the sale of the goods. Volunteers (internationals, health professionals, life assistants) are helping to make the program sustainable and to lead the personal development of youth.
Personnally, I gave a hand for two months in preparing the ground and building new allotments, which allowed to double the capacity of production.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Youth leader', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Plein Air Evasion', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': 'French-German summer camp for children from 11 to 17 years old.
